1875470.name: Ninjas Against the Machines
1875470.detailed_description:
The world is depending on you, Ninja! Powerful machines have traveled through time to destroy all of humanity! Equipped with your bo staff, your javelin, and your wits, you must take the machines head on, utilizing any and all futuristic technology you can find along the way.

Key Features:
  • Unique Challenges - Ninjas Against the Machines uses a unique challenge system for permanent upgrades like health, damage, and unlocks. No longer do you need to farm in order to earn those upgrades - your skills are put to the test!
  • Over 30 Enhancements - On each run, you can choose one enhancement to take with you. As you collect coins during a run, you can purchase them to give you an edge in battle.
  • Platform Like a Ninja - The world in which the machines have created is a challenging place. Luckily you have you javelin, climbing spikes, air/ground dash attack, and more to help traverse its dangerous nature.
  • Randomly Generated Stages - Each time you initiate a new run, all stages are randomly compiled out of premade bits so your playthrough is never identical.
  • Even MORE Challenges - Completing your first run opens up new opportunities and challenges.
  • Race Against the Clock - Your time for all run types are saved on the steam leaderboards - can you beat the game with the fastest time?

1875520.name: Oscar's Paradise
1875520.detailed_description:
Oscar is on his dream journey to collect as many scraps as he can. Join him on a fast paced retro 3D marble game inspired by many before it.
Join Oscar on his fast paced journey as he rushes to get his scraps

Features

There is currently more than 40 stages for Oscar to rush though with many difficult challenges along the way.


Join Oscar on a near friction-less adventure as he rolls and slides through levels


Oscar will randomly jump with joy as you roll around. this is not always a good thing as it can send you flying into obstacles

1875540.name: Aria
1875540.detailed_description:
Aria is a narrative-driven adventure game following a young girl - Aria and her travelling companion, a “Dolki” (Half Dolphin, half Kiwi). A recent tragedy has left Aria adrift in her own imagination where corruption has begun to intrude upon the lands. Only bringing together the lost pendant pieces can save her world and its citizens.

Go at your own pace while gliding through the surreal environments by zooming through at breakneck speeds, or by taking your time to enjoy the sights. Slower paced swimming provides a peaceful interlude to play in the slow swaying kelp or with the schools of fish.

Featuring hand-painted environments and an orchestral soundtrack, Aria delivers a heart-stirring and unique experience.

1875530.name: Grim Tales: Graywitch Collector's Edition
1875530.detailed_description:
Elephant Games proudly presents the newest installment of the Grim Tales series!

While researching her family’s history, your relative was pulled back in time! It’s up to you to travel into the past to find her, but it won’t be easy. There’s a mysterious monster on the prowl and the town’s history remains a mystery. Can you uncover the identity of the monster and rescue your friend in time? Find out in this exhilarating hidden-object puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector’s Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Play as Victor and stop an evil cult in the bonus chapter!
• Earn achievements and find hidden collectibles and morphing objects.
• Unlock the secret room to test your skills!
• Enjoy concept art, wallpapers, screensavers, soundtrack and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide.

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

1875560.name: Mare
1875560.detailed_description:
As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious artificial bird.

Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure, trapped in a mysterious narrative.

  • Immerse yourself in the strange landscapes from the perspective of an artificial bird.
  • Guide and Protect a vulnerable AI companion on her journey.
  • 8 Chapters To explore and discover.
  • Search For Lost Artifacts hidden in the world, they will unlock the final secret of Mare.

REVIEWS



Upload VR: Winner of 2021 Upload Awards - Hidden Gem. Mare is a breathless beauty of a VR game – simplistic in its progression perhaps but never anything less than astonishing to take in.

The VR Grid: It’s not about the destination, but the journey as they say, and Mare is one helluva journey. From the opening moments of the game, all the way to it’s conclusion, I was enamored by the presentation and the story.

Mare is nothing short of breathtaking and a welcome change of pace to the to action-packed, fast-paced titles I have been playing of late. Its a strikingly beautiful yet solemn adventure that pushes you ever forward toward the unknown.

6DOF Reviews: Mare is a title I can easily recommend to anybody who has an appreciation for beauty and mystery. It evokes a mood unlike any I’ve experienced in VR.. It may be brief, but its impact will far outlive its duration, proving beyond a doubt that it’s the quality of our experiences that matter, and not their duration.

Mare is a class act from start to finish. It's a macabre and mysterious adventure that offers a haunting experience that long outlives its light puzzles and relatively brief playtime.

VR Focus:A puzzle experience with beautiful scenery and a mysterious plotline all about a girl who needs your help. The barren environment coupled with the superb musical score ensures Mare has an ambience and soul few VR projects achieve.

1875640.name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 Personality Pack Guarded, Blunt Girl
1875640.detailed_description:
An all new heroine type, the "Blunt Girl" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D 2!
You can now hire “Blunt” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

The costumes included in this DLC are compatible with both the High Poly Body and Normal Body.
You can use them in both COM3D2 and COM3D2.5.

～Who is this Blunt Girl?～
A cautious, guarded girl with a slightly (?) sharp tongue. She won't turn that sharp tongue on just anyone, though; she keeps it reserved for sexual harassers and perpetrators of other inappropriate behaviors. Because of the her guarded nature, it's hard to get friendly with her, and her attitude is typically blunt and curt to the point where it's impossible to imagine her having a softer side. She'll even get into spats with other women over the finer details of what constitutes "correct behavior," and she applies her standards for correctness fairly, equally, and without prejudice. Why exactly she came to the Empire Club is shrouded in mystery. Will you get her to warm up to you, or will she continue to hate you? It all depends on what attitude you take towards her.
• You can enjoy training, job communication, and scenes as a maid working in the Empire Club with Guarded, Blunt Girl!
• Playable events are available before becoming a lover with Guarded, Blunt Girl, such as a love story and events where Guarded, Blunt Girl interacts with other maids!

“Blunt” is not yet compatible with the following additional DLC’s.
Blunt is not compatible with the same DLC’s as “Sweet Little Devil,” so please note before purchasing.
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

Our next planned release is to make Blunt compatible with these three separate DLCs , please wait a little longer.
Even in Japan, the development of GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb differs depending on the heroine type.
The translation work will be done after Japan develops them. We hope you understand that this will take some time.
We are working to release it as soon as possible, so please be patient.

1875670.name: Gigant
1875670.detailed_description:
Gigant is a horror point and click adventure game. You must escape from the terror of the unknown creature 'Gigant' and the conflict that revolves around it. Use your reflexes to dodge the creature's attack. Combine and use tools to overcome the given challenges.

Synopsis

The place is Seoul, South Korea.


Da-hoon, the main character who has lost his job, finds a part-time job with a suspiciously high salary.

The person who proposed the job demands that Da-hoon bring the body parts of a giant man-eating creature, known as 'Gigant'. Da-hoon accepts this dangerous offer, which may risk his life.

Will he survive Gigant's wrath?

Features

  • Unique scenes that is only possible in point-and-click adventure
  • Unique lines and horror stories based on generational conflict
  • Gameplay that actively utilizes disassembly and combination of items
  • A different kind of fun from classic adventures through QTE
  • Unique pixel art style

1875720.name: Zoo Tales
1875720.detailed_description:
Not recommended

Zoo Lore 0.7: Version is subject to playability and playability, not recommended to purchase at this stage. Version 0.7 contains only experimental content and almost no playable content. Therefore, if you want to play with your family and friends, please wait for the update to the official version of the game. Note: The current version contains experimental content only and is not recommended for purchase


About the Game

Choose the best strategy, get supplies, and win. Survive, kill, fight the mysteries of the unknown, and experience undifferentiated strategic contests. 《Zoo Tales》 offers an exciting story and brings you a new multiplayer competitive experience. You walked into the zoo in this city. It claims to include the vast majority of species suitable for zoo feeding in the world. You thought it would be an ordinary and pleasant distraction. Other tourists around you laughing and chatting think so. Keep away from the rabbit. Don't break the rules. Believe in human beings. Stick to yourself. Keep calm and remember all the information that can help you. We must fight bravely ——And escape the zoo alive. You will play the role of a tourist, an employee, or some strange messenger to seek survival in this abnormal zoo. Do you want to obey the rules? Which one should you choose? Or make a choice with your own judgment? —— Choose what you believe is right and defeat what you believe is wrong. See the truth and defend the dignity of life. ——"Unity, courage and unwavering loyalty are the greatest virtues of mankind." ——Now select the map in the story in online mode and join the game with your friends to start playing!

1875710.name: PARACHUTER
1875710.detailed_description:
《PARACHUTER》is a turn-based shooting game with a strategic nature. Make moves by utilizing a limited number of moves, and then defeat a variety of enemies in the right position. Players will fight in various environments to escape this ridiculous world alive.
Background story:
In 2560, if World War I was held. Joshi Kol is doing skydiving as usual.
Suddenly, a light shined on Kol's face in the air. Kol consciously closed his eyes, but when he reopened, a mysterious space appeared.
There was a strange sound in the head of the call. This is God's play.
He is the prey of this game chosen by God. To make him a little more alive, God gave him a gravity maneuver.
The direction of gravity can be changed by the gravity control device.
However, this device has been used many times.
The winner of the game gets a chance to return to the original world. Kol decided to break through the siege and return to the original world.

Planning and Art:
YU ZONGQI
program:
Liu Yang

1875770.name: Tartaria: The forgotten tale
1875770.detailed_description:
Tartaria is an adventure game about a young prince. It takes place in a fantasy world where ancient Russian myths come alive.
In the beginning of the story you set off to a sage to master a sword-based martial art, magic and become very agile. You use this knowledge to find the reason why dark force gets into the people’s world and to finally defend your home land.

And you must remember — every world have its own rules...



The game’s mechanics and story:

  • Fights using various weapons and magic, as well as tactical movements, blocks and dodges. The main character and enemies use attacks of different strength, speed and range.

  • Dynamic system of enemy behavior. For example, your actions can frighten the enemy and he will run away.

  • In addition to combat episodes, the game has many quests and tasks that will allow you to immerse yourself in Slavic culture and get acquainted with interesting traditions.

  • You have to move between the world of people and the magical world of dark forces. The hero will meet many mythical creatures of Russian fairy tales and legends.

  • The environment and atmosphere of the game are inspired by the most beautiful Russian nature.

Taking place around 900 A.D., you play a young prince who starts off protecting his Slavic principality from robbers, dark forces, and evil mythical beings using brawn, and magic.

1875800.name: Cubytet
1875800.detailed_description:
Cubytet is a 3D puzzle game in which you need to place pieces of different shapes on the playing field in order to score as many points as possible. This game is based on the world's most famous 2D puzzle game and is its 3D analog with some additional game mechanics!

The game has 2 game modes:
  • Sigleplayer - in this mode, the player needs to score as many points as possible, while the speed of the game gradually increases
  • Player vs AI - In this mode, the player needs to score 2500 points before artificial intelligence does it

When the horizontal panel is completely filled with cubes, this panel will be removed from the playing field, and the player will be awarded points. The player receives points for the following actions:
  • 5 points - placing a piece on the playing field;
  • 100 points - filling one panel with cubes;
  • 400 points - filling two panels with cubes at the same time;
  • 900 points - filling three panels with cubes at the same time;
  • 1600 points - filling four panels with cubes at the same time.

The game has a leaderboard that will allow players to find out their current rank among all players in the world, as well as compete for first place.

Unique game mechanics

The constructor:

This mechanic allows the player to add and remove additional cubes to the next piece. This makes the gameplay more interesting and diverse, and also helps the player to get out of a difficult situation.

The cut:

This mechanic allows the player to make the cubes translucent to look inside the playing field. In addition, those areas of the playing field that are currently completely inaccessible will be highlighted in yellow. This simplifies orientation on the playing field and helps the player to make a decision faster.

1875810.name: Slashers
1875810.detailed_description:
SEE OUR NEW GAME!


About the Game

Welcome to Slashers!


In Slashers always a group of young people will get into an abandoned place, you must find a way to get out of there, but it will not be easy since you will always have a murderer stalking you.

Lost and found


Find objects randomly on the map, these will serve as a Puzzle to fit with other fragments and weaken the enemy.

Randomness


Many elements of the map, such as objects are totally random every time you play a new game, the enemies are unpredictable and do not follow guidelines when going to certain places.

Flee or fight


You can try to escape from the enemy or fight against him, there are several objects on the map with which you can hit the enemy and stun him, this can be useful to save friends.

Avoid getting caught


If you are caught they will lock you in areas where your friends can rescue you or yourself on some occasions, if everyone is trapped, you will move on to another unwanted form.

Complete the ritual


Find various elements to fit them into fragments to weaken and defeat the enemy.

Don't be alone in the dark


Beware of loneliness and darkness, the longer you stay, the more you will be suggested, you will begin to hear sounds and things will begin to happen.

Control the flashlight


The batteries are running out and this causes you to see less and less intensely, keep the flashlight recharged with new batteries.

Beware of noises


Voices and interactions attract the enemy, control the noises coming out of your microphone and the actions you do, if a partner screams they can catch you in the middle.

Manage the Stamina


You may find yourself in cornered situations that would only save you if you could run, it could be fatal to run out of stamina.

Take precautions in the face of light


The light will recover you from your paranoia, however it can also be a perfect focus to attract the enemy, use it to your advantage but be careful.

Manage fragments


It will take a while to place the fragments, be consistent and manage it before the enemy catches you red-handed.

Stay alert


The enemy will turn off/on the electricity, open/close doors, remove/add gasoline to the generator.

Listen to sounds


Enemies always make characteristic sounds when they go for someone, if that someone is you, you will always hear a music of tension, if it disappears it means that it has stopped chasing you.

Collect


There will always be collectibles on the map, which you can find individually, some of them are very hidden and others are not, you will need to take them in order for the next one to be shown.

Vision


Enemies have a hard time seeing in the dark, play in the shadows, and avoid light emissions so they aren't detected.

Phases


Each fragment placed will weaken the enemy, but it will become stronger, larger, faster and more aggressive.

Be smart


Point out items that you will need in certain circumstances, these items will be visible at all times by all players.

Modes


Slashers is characterized by having various game modes, some of these are developing and others will come out little by little (Classic, Escape, Slashers, Madness and Turn).

Replayability


The game is designed to be replayed infinitely times, so every tent, objects, posters, will appear randomly or be randomly generated.
You will also unlock difficulties as you play, this will increase the number of fragments you must get and the enemy will reach new phases.

Support us


We require positive reviews that we count on our website to make updates and improvements to our game, you can see all the improvements we have raised in our roadmap.

1875850.name: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning
1875850.detailed_description:
Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning is a little, but fun 2D platformer where you play as a red blob fighting through the different levels in each of the 4 different seasons to save the season from the enemies you will encounter. (Although this is not said in the main game).

Each season presents itself with its own challenge.

Summer:
In Summer you will be faced with incredible heat to knock your spirit down.

Autumn:
In Autumn the leaves will blow in your face and you must be careful to not be blinded by them.

Winter:
In Winter you will have to tread through the harsh and cold snow.

Spring:
In Spring you will be surrounded by a lovely breeze but don't get too comfortable remember you still need to save the seasons!

In the game, there are two different enemies that will stop you on your trail.

The blocks and the maces. The blocks are square entities with spikes around them and angry eyes, while the maces are just maces that spin around in a circle. You will need to face both enemies in order to complete the level.

In order to move to the next level you will need to get to the chest at the end of the level but be careful because some levels will take you off the path and mislead you with a fake chest.

You will also find checkpoints around the level so when you die you will respawn at that checkpoint.

Happy traveling Red Adventurers! Enjoy the journey.

1874930.name: JUST HOOPS Demo
1874930.detailed_description:
The old-school arcade basketball experience meets new-school virtual technology in JUST HOOPS!

Welcome to our free demo.

Take the live-action of arcade basketball into your living room with the first-ever reality-simulated shoot-the-hoop game! Inspired by 80’s arcade basketball, JUST HOOPS is an immersive gaming experience that features multiple play modes, challenges, and more than 45 levels of changing hoops! Using state-of-the-art technology that utilizes the actual physics behind grabbing and shooting a ball, JUST HOOPS’ new and innovative features optimize gameplay for the most dynamic VR basketball experience possible.

Compete against friends for bragging rights, enjoy hoop time with family, or play to climb the world leaderboard. Targets change at every increasing level, from traditional coin-op baskets to animated hoops like snakes, space invaders, rotating hoops with closing lids and more!

1874950.name: Runner Party
1874950.detailed_description:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Runner Party is a local and multiplayer Steam Remote play with diverse mechanics.

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players

In a 80’s and 90’s universe, you can participate in fun races filled with platforms and filled with obstacles.

You will have many items to separate yourself from your opponents and win the race ! Get out of the screen and you will be eliminated !

Be the most responsive to win the race by winning 3 rounds !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players


Runner Party is in early access.
The game will evolve quickly and offer later

- 1 character editor (win and collect cards to get new skins ! Customize your character ! )

- Additional levels
- an AI to play alone
- Servers to play online
- A complete matchmaking system as well as many leagues

Join us on discord !

1874990.name: Fluids & Sounds: Mind relaxing and meditative
1874990.detailed_description:
--- Fluids & Sounds 2021: Magic mind relaxing game ---
Are you stressed or feel some anxiety in you? You want to be an artist and create beautiful art with ease? You are just looking for something which calms you down and makes you relaxed?
I think this will be the perfect app for you! This magical, glowing fluid simulation is here to release the stress from your life now!

--- Features of Magic fluid simulation 2021: Mind relaxing game ---
✅ Fluid simulation with dozens of parameters to play around with (color, bloom, sunrays, resolution, force, and more)
✅ Sound synthesis designed for meditating, stress-relieving music
✅ Take screenshots and share them with anyone you like
✅ Record videos (please note: the fluid sounds are not recorded, only the background music. Also the UI is excluded from recording, so you'll only record what matters - your art)
✅ Save and load your favorite settings using presets
✅ Trippy and easy fluid explorer/editor app with simple UI/UX
✅ Real-time fluid art viewer with colorful and psychedelic impressions on your screen

--- Take it as a colorful, psychedelic therapy ---
Take it as a therapy which hopefully will have a positive effect on your daily life. You can tap or swipe on the screen to create trippy, psychedelic looking fluids. These fluids will help you to focus, relax and meditate. On top of that, I added some real-time sound synthesis, which makes this experience unforgettable. Let the fluids flow your stress away! The relaxing fluid simulation app will bring new colors in your life. It's really a psychedelic experience, like seeing some of those glowing, geometric pieces of art in front of you. You can see different combinations of eye-catching colors created by this magic glow liquid fluid app. Pour out your little mind on the mobile screen and so some crazy creative art aesthetics. Believe it or not! You will love to play this color magic glow fluid app. You will fall in love with the experience you get! The new stress releasing crazy kids fluid simulation app!
Are you ready to feel the satisfaction of creative freedom and its impact on your mental wellbeing? The new fluid art meditation and stimulation app is here for you. Enjoy breathtaking art patterns and soulful music till you feel calm and relaxed. Download and use Fluids and Sounds today!

Fluid simulations are one of the best visual, psychedelic looking fx experiences you can get. Indulge into a magic world where you can make anything flow with a magic touch of liquid. Enjoy hypnotizing, magic colors and fluids in this stress-relieving simulator. You can calm down, relieve stress and meditate by painting swirly liquids or flowing water with that math-based fluidsim.
Seek awareness and peace within the minute you open this app and make the most out of your free time with this free, wonderful, and trippy app. Hope you'll enjoy, because we believe you deserve to feel calm and relaxed!
Please don't forget to share this app if you like it! Perhaps your friends are already waiting to see this new magic fluids game!

--- Feedback ---
We value your feedback!
Contact us if you have any suggestions about our Magic fluid simulation 2021: Mind relaxing game. We always appreciate user feedback and must act on it. Last but not least: don’t forget to rate us better, thanks!
- Best regards Marvin

1874980.name: Ready for Riot
1874980.detailed_description:
The game is set in American prisons torn by constant prisoner riots. The player controls a police assault group member and recapturing the prison is his objective.
The gameplay revolves around forming a group of 1-4 players helping each other in cooperative missions against computer-controlled prisoners (playing single is available) and then using firearms and different accessories in order to rescue hostages, reclaim prison and/or fulfill any other main/side objectives.

Features:


- Experience real, true hardcore riot american prison style. No limits!



-As a member of special police task force, your job is to control and recapture most dangerous computer- controled prisoners. You can do it single handedly with help of computer generated squad or with your friends in full co-op mode



-Immerse in a world full of dangerous convictas and rioters ready to take what they want without remorse!

1875100.name: Crackin' Smackin
1875100.detailed_description:
During the stone age things were settled in a more simple and direct manner. Brawl with your friends in the arena or work together to throw your enemies out of the ring. But don’t forget to use the destructible arena as a weapon! It doesn’t matter what type of player you are, tactician or button-smasher, you will have your chance at victory!

BRAWLING
Meet other players in the arena and fight for victory. Knock your enemies off the platform by hitting them with your mighty club, the last caveman standing wins!



DESTRUCTIBLE ARENAS
Smash the floor and reshape the battleground. The floor of the arena is destructible, use it to give yourself an advantage!



FUN & CHAOS
Many different playstyles and strategies make every match unique. Embrace the chaotic and ever changing club frenzy and experience the fun with your fellow cavemen!



CUSTOMIZE
Change how you look by changing outfits, weapons, armor and tattoos. Create your very own caveman!



STORE
Get the weapons, armors and many other things you like from our ingame store. All items are visual only and will not have any influence on your stats or gameplay.

1875120.name: Marsmare: Alienation
1875120.detailed_description:
Marsmare: Alienation is a thrilling metroidvania adventure game. It tells the story of a simple guy from Earth who is abducted by insidious aliens.

Wishlist the game now!

Explore the underground alien base and Mars caves

Mars is a much more mysterious planet than meets the eye. Its underworld is riddled with natural caves and tunnelsof a subterranean base.

Once in the secret laboratory, our captured hero managed to deal with the alien and avoid probing. However, this is only the very beginning of his adventures on the Red Planet!

Throughout the game you will have to explore every nook and cranny of the underground base, collect all the alien artifacts, avoid cunning traps and find a way to return home.

Fight against dangerous enemies

Playing Marsmare: Alienation, you will face a variety of enemies.

Among them are:

  • Martian scientists and military personnel;
  • Spider robots and drones;
  • Cave fauna and flora.

Each enemy requires a special approach: our hero is extremely limited in resources, so one awkward move and you'll have to return to the checkpoint.

Find a way back home

While exploring the alien base, you will discover special items: a blaster, a space suit and a jetpack. Each item will add new abilities and open the way to previously inaccessible areas.

To escape from Mars, you'll need to find the alien flying saucer (yes, yes, the same one on which you were kidnapped!), collect all the energy crystals and fuel.

A real old-school adventure

Marsmare: Alienation was developed specifically for the ZX Spectrum retro computer and took first place at the Yandex Retro Games Battle 2020 competition. And now there’s a special PC version of the game to allow as many gamers as possible to play it!

The game features two graphical modes: classic and modern. This means you can play both the original version of Marsmare: Alienation and enjoy the updated, full-color pixel graphics.

Collect items, shoot back enemies, jump over chasms, and learn to avoid dangerous traps. Save the game by activating checkpoints.

Download Marsmare: Alienation and immerse yourself in the captivating atmosphere of classic 8-bit games!

Achievements

There are 10 different achievements in the game. To unlock them all, you'll have to sweat a lot!

Still not sure?

Wishlist the game as soon as possible! So you won't miss the discount and will be able to buy the game at an even better price!

1875140.name: 黎明为歌 - Melody before the Dawn
1875140.detailed_description:
关于我们

玩家群：894964809（供玩家交流ww遇到种问题也可以来反馈！）
游戏开发者微博：@符绾_Retsu

可以点击上方【发行商】一栏，进入我们的主页。
关注我们，即可获取更多后续游戏相关消息哦~


About the Game


居住在极北之地的少女瑟里卡，每晚都会在睡梦中进入另一个世界——
这里有着她未曾见过的风景，鲜活的友人，以及一场奇迹般的邂逅。
懵懂的感情为之觉醒，却被提醒一切只是幻梦……
梦与现实究竟有什么联系，她们的命运又会发生怎样的转变呢？
迷雾笼罩身周，她将舒展梦境的羽翼，为黎明献上歌唱。

这是一款较为轻松的剧情向解谜游戏，你将扮演瑟里卡在这个世界中度过新年前的七天。
你需要翻越雪山、穿过森林，也会遇到一些阻碍。
本作游戏时长约为8~10小时，共有三个结局。
请拨开纠缠的迷雾，寻找世界的真相吧！








使用鼠标或方向键进行移动
空格/z/Enter 确认/进行调查
Esc/x 取消/打开菜单

※地图上有一些可收集物，把它们送给合适的人，可以了解到更多的信息。
※试试仔细观察地图，也许有一些线索帮助你找到前进的道路。
※遇到卫兵的搜查记得及时存档，被他们抓到可不是什么好事情。

部分玩法内容预览：






制作人：符绾
编剧：敏纳娄什、睡不醒的虾米
文案优化协助：双尾喵喵
美术：符绾、SuikaXD、百合子
音乐：Music by Eric Matyas soundimage
发行：梦结界工作室

1875180.name: Wonderbirds
1875180.detailed_description:
This world is in danger. The islands go under water. The birdfolk have flown away.
But the eggs of unhatched nestlings remained on these islands.

Only our heroes can save everyone.
The five Wonderbirds will pass through all adventures, fight off predatory animals and save poor feather kids.

Wonderbirds, save the wonderful nestlings!



Wonderbirds is an action puzzle game in the spirit of the old Lemmings.
The chicks hatch from the eggs on the islands and start walking towards the rescue airship. On the way they will have many predators.
You play as a miracle bird that can make paths or dig channels. So you can pave the way for the chicks, make it safer. You can also stun predators, block their way. Being close to the chicks, you take them under protection. Different miracle birds also have different magical abilities that will allow the chicks to get out of this mess faster.

  • Five characters
  • Five main biomes
  • Dozens of NPC types
  • Different gameplay - from hurricane action to think a liittle puzzles

Have a good game!

1875180.short_description: Meet new Lemmings that meets Xonix. Escort dozens of nestlings to save them from the global flood and furious predators. Use your magic wisely and carefully. Coop with your friends and family to have more fun.

1875230.name: A Pigeon Detective Game: Twin Beaks
1875230.detailed_description:
A Pigeon Detective Game: Twin Beaks is a murder-mystery novel game set in an idyllic tourist village. Meet the prime suspects as you question them about their alibis, and gather all of their saucy secrets. Your case seems simple, a body found at dawn belonging to the village's delivery pigeon, Bobert Squab... yet what lies underneath this humble town is darkness and intrigue.

Branching and Unlockable Dialogue

  • Meet and interview your suspects, unlocking dialogue as you find out more info from other pigeons and the environment around you.

Open World

  • Explore in a 3rd-person perspective as you rollerskate around the village of Twin Beaks.


You alone have the power to find out what really happened that fateful night, and bring the right pigeon to justice!

1875270.name: The Star Legation Soundtrack
1875270.detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack (OST) for The Star Legation was composed by professional guitarist and composer, Andy Mitchell.

Description: All music is synthesized and recorded with a Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) and can be described as a blend between techno, rock, and classical styles to fit the scifi genre of The Star Legation game.

Included:
* 40 of Andy's original compositions written and arranged for The Star Legation game, with a total runtime of 99 minutes and 35 seconds.
* Album cover art
* 9 pages of composer's notes detailing the background and inspiration for each selection
* Links to 10 of the compositions with audio recordings of Andy performing them on guitar, alongside sheet music for skilled guitarists (available on the website)

1875310.name: Pro Basketball Manager 2023
1875310.detailed_description:
Basketball is more than coaching, if you want your favorite team to succeed you will also have to oversee the recruitment of new players and manage your arena to secure new sources of funding for your team. PBM23 lets you be the coach as well as the General Manager of any professional team around the world.

You can choose from 82 domestic leagues, including 10 women’s leagues, from 60 different countries across Europe, America, Asia and Oceania. With more than 2000 teams and 50 000 players it is not hard to see why PBM23 is truly a global basketball management game. Overall, including national and continental cups, you’ll have access to more than 160 playable competitions.

Once your reputation as a coach is established you might be offered a job as a head coach of a national team. International basketball is now more competitive than ever. Will you be up to the task of taking your national team to the top of your continent and then the world?

The user interface has been redesigned, with a complete overhaul of the player page that now features updated statistics and records as well as highlighted player capabilities by profile.

New customisable 3D arenas are coming to PBM23 with enhanced lighting effects for a more realistic look. Pro Basketball Manager has never looked so good - make your arena bigger, more modern, more unique, make it shine and get the crowd cheering. The perfect setting for a successful season!
The crowd will now react to on court events making the games more dynamic than ever!

All players in the game now feature detailed statistics covering their career. You will be able to look at past and present performances from your favourite players.

The editor has also been improved to include more features for a fully customisable gaming experience.

LICENSES

The following leagues are officially licensed in PBM2023 with official names and photos of their players and teams:

COACHING

Coaching is not just asking a player to setup a specific play at a specific time. A successful coach has a set of unique plays that can decide the fate of a game when it matters the most, when the game is on the line! In PBM23 you can create your own plays and call them during the games to take your opponent off-guard. Don’t call the same plays too often though, as your opponent will adapt and try to outsmart you.

STATISTICS

Be it individual players or teams, you have a whole range of statistics at your fingertips which allow you to manage your progress. You can thus check on your players’ performances (past and present), evaluate your own career, or even look back through the archives of the games of any team featured in PBM23.

SCOUTING, TRAINING, FINANCES

Through our in-depth scouting system, you can send your scouts around the world to be on the lookout for the next best players to make it to the top. Train your players collectively, but also individually to get the best results. Improve your club's finances by improving your arena to generate extra revenue.

GAME SIMULATION

3D mode: Follow the on-court action, making tactical changes on the fly and assigning your own plays to a player.
2D mode: If you prefer, you can also follow the game in 2D.
Text mode: You can also follow the game through a series of text messages that will detail the action on the court.
If you cannot wait any longer for the result, you can skip a quarter or even the entire game for an immediate result.

FEATURES

In Pro Basketball Manager 2023 we have implemented a new user interface. All the information will now be only a few clicks away! The new player page will make it easier to access key information.
We also have the new customisable 3D arenas, coming in two different sizes and looks. They now look better than ever with enhanced lighting effects!
This year you will have the added benefit of the home crowd reacting to the game’s events. Be it a dunk or a dagger from downtown, the crowd will let you know their appreciation!

GAME EDITOR

The database editor has been improved to include new features to allow you to customize your database more flexibly than ever. You can even create new competitions and leagues if your favourite one is missing in the game.
The Steam Workshop is now seamlessly integrated into the game. The in-game menus allow you to download databases created by other players around the world and use them before starting your coaching career.

PLAYABLE LEAGUES

America:
2 continental competitions
Argentina (1 men's league), Brazil (1 men's league), Canada (1 men's league), Chile (1 men's league), Colombia (1 men's league), Dominican Republic (1 men's league), Mexico (1 men's league), Panama (1 men's league), Puerto Rico (1 men's league), Uruguay (1 men's league), USA (1 men's league), Venezuela (1 men's league)

Asia:
1 continental competition
China (1 men's league), Japan (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Philippines (1 men's league), Republic of China (1 men's league), South Korea (1 men's league)

Europe:
8 continental competitions
Albania (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Austria (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Belarus (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Belgium (1 national cup), Belgium - Netherlands (1 men's league), Bosnia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Bulgaria (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Croatia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Cyprus (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Czech Republic (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Denmark (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Estonia - Latvia (1 men's league), Finland (1 men's league, 1 national cup), France (4 men's leagues, 2 women's leagues, 2 national cups), Georgia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Germany (3 men's leagues, 1 national cup), England,Scotland,Wales (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Greece (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Hungary (1 men's league, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Iceland (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Israel (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Italy (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 2 national cups), Kosovo (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Lithuania (2 men's leagues, 1 national cup), Luxembourg (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Macedonia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Montenegro (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Netherlands (1 national cup), Norway (1 men's league), Poland (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Portugal (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Romania (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Russia (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 1 national cup), Serbia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Slovakia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Slovenia (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Spain (3 men's leagues, 1 women's league, 2 national cups), Sweden (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Switzerland (1 men's league, 1 national cup), Turkey (2 men's leagues, 1 women's league), Ukraine (1 men's league, 1 national cup)

Oceania:

1874560.name: Infinadeck Medieval Maze
1874560.detailed_description:
This virtual reality maze is a basic experience for the Infinadeck Omnidirectional Treadmill. It takes just under 2 minutes at max speed to get from the start to the end when using the treadmill- how fast can you make it through? Many objects are interactable within the space, and there are a couple of Easter eggs here and there. Designed for first time walkers, there are no jumpscares or things chasing you- the nuances of the experiences are up to you. Will you clear the maze as fast as possible? Or perhaps stroll through at your own pace? Enjoy this simple example of Infinadeck Experience Platform™ software at your leisure.

This maze was built using free assets from the Unity Store, including the SteamVR Unity Plugin, so it seemed right that this project be distributed for free as well.

Useful desktop keybinds:
General:
Escape to Exit Game
Equal to Hide GUI
Ctrl+I to Toggle Infinadeck Plugin
LeftShift to Reload Current Level
Space to Stop Treadmill
RightShift to Start Treadmill
Backslash to Import General/Timer Preferences
Backspace to Reset General/Timer Preferences

Reference Objects:
Q to Toggle Deck Ring
W to Toggle Deck Edge
E to Toggle Deck Center
R to Toggle Reference Panel
T to Toggle In-Engine Deck
Y to Toggle Heading
U to Toggle Colorblind
I to Cycle Panel Theme
O to Cycle Deck Center

Timers:
Alpha1 to Set Timer to 1 Minute
Alpha2 to Set Timer to 2 Minute
Alpha3 to Set Timer to 3 Minute
Alpha4 to Set Timer to 4 Minute
Alpha5 to Set Timer to 5 Minute
Alpha6 to Set Timer to 6 Minute
Alpha7 to Set Timer to 7 Minute
Alpha8 to Set Timer to 8 Minute
Alpha9 to Set Timer to 9 Minute
Alpha0 to Set Timer to 10 Minute
Minus to Toggle Demo Mode
1874560.about_the_game:
This virtual reality maze is a basic experience for the Infinadeck Omnidirectional Treadmill. It takes just under 2 minutes at max speed to get from the start to the end when using the treadmill- how fast can you make it through? Many objects are interactable within the space, and there are a couple of Easter eggs here and there. Designed for first time walkers, there are no jumpscares or things chasing you- the nuances of the experiences are up to you. Will you clear the maze as fast as possible? Or perhaps stroll through at your own pace? Enjoy this simple example of Infinadeck Experience Platform™ software at your leisure.

This maze was built using free assets from the Unity Store, including the SteamVR Unity Plugin, so it seemed right that this project be distributed for free as well.

Useful desktop keybinds:
General:
Escape to Exit Game
Equal to Hide GUI
Ctrl+I to Toggle Infinadeck Plugin
LeftShift to Reload Current Level
Space to Stop Treadmill
RightShift to Start Treadmill
Backslash to Import General/Timer Preferences
Backspace to Reset General/Timer Preferences

Reference Objects:
Q to Toggle Deck Ring
W to Toggle Deck Edge
E to Toggle Deck Center
R to Toggle Reference Panel
T to Toggle In-Engine Deck
Y to Toggle Heading
U to Toggle Colorblind
I to Cycle Panel Theme
O to Cycle Deck Center

Timers:

Alpha3 to Set Timer to 3 Minute
Alpha4 to Set Timer to 4 Minute
Alpha5 to Set Timer to 5 Minute
Alpha6 to Set Timer to 6 Minute
Alpha7 to Set Timer to 7 Minute
Alpha8 to Set Timer to 8 Minute
Alpha9 to Set Timer to 9 Minute
Alpha0 to Set Timer to 10 Minute
Minus to Toggle Demo Mode
1874560.short_description: A twisty-turny castle maze designed to show off the strengths of the Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill. Designed for both slow and fast walkers, this experience is fun for all ages when paired with a full virtual reality setup.

1874572.name: RPG Maker MV - Otani Pixel Fantasy Enemy Pack Vol.3
1874572.detailed_description:
Looking for an intimidating monster to make an epic battle? Look no further than Otani’s high-quality fantasy pixel art series! Proudly introducing Vol.3!

This is a nice to have pack for creators looking to make an epic-looking world or story!
This Enemy Pack includes 60 different types of pixel art of fantasy enemies, from common to legendary monsters. These would definitely make your world more vivid than ever!

Included materials
＜Graphics＞
This package contains 60 types of pixel art data - 3 small, 4 medium, and 3 large type monsters, including iconic ones like Gargoyle, Devil Lord, Chimera, etc. Each monster type contains
6 types of color and detail variations, totaling up to 60 sets of pixel art! Each set also has two sizes to suit all your battle needs!

＜Reference＞
────────────────────────

────────────────────────

Recommended purchasing this pack in conjunction with other Otani’s packs to maintain a consistent art style and enhance the realism of your game!


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

1874610.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Desert Map Pack
1874610.detailed_description:
FG Desert Map Pack

The Desert Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package allows the creation of desert and arid locations and consists of a solid base of natural elements and backgrounds. 

This pack includes the following items:

  • Background images of many sand, rock, and ground types with varied transitions between each of them
  • Decorations include many rocks and rock formations, desert plants and trees, and more
  • Effects of all ground types for further customizations and smooth integrations
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

1874630.detailed_description:
Fight your way through the mazes of Room Box. Defeat countless enemies and Bosses and explore dozen of rooms with unique Challenges.

Game Features
  • TopDown Shooter. But it's more than just a Bullet Hell.
  • Defeat, Survive, Rest, Loot... Explore the Rooms of the maze where each Room has unique Challenge to complete. And There is MORE to come. with a slice of Metroidvania.
  • Fight countless enemies and Dozen of mini-Bosses and Bosses
  • Endless-mode and Procedural Generated Mazes.
  • Upgrade your Player stats, equip new Weapons and learn new Skills to keep up with the increasing difficulty.

More Features in Plan.
Join the Discord Server for closer details on the development

1874620.name: DIVE
1874620.detailed_description:
DIVE is a 3rd person shooter with light puzzles and platforming. You play as a recently activated candidate, exploring an artificial and abandoned world while trying to overcome its trials and enemies. Combat is heavily inspired by Nier and Megaman Legends.

Developer Notes

This has been fairly long solo project (stretching about 3x over the original 6 month estimate), but it ended up being so enjoyable to design, build, and playtest that I honestly had a difficult time stopping. For the project itself, my goal is to take a break from this and use the lessons-learned on bringing other projects to life.


If this project looks or feels like something you'd like to see receive more love and attention, then feel free to ping me on Twitter or some other venue.

Thank you for playing!

1874670.name: Shirone: the Dragon Girl Demo
1874670.detailed_description:
Imagine waking up in a haunted castle.
"Where am I?"
You ask every creature you see, but none of them know.
The only thing you're sure of is that you need to get out of here.
That's the situation Shirone is in, and she needs your help to escape.

”Shirone: the Dragon Girl" is a 3D adventure game where you help Shirone solve puzzles and riddles to find a way out of a haunted castle.
Escaping the castle is the main objective, and to do that you'll need to make full use of her wings and tail!

Find clues to solve the puzzles that block your escape.
Your imagination and creativity is what will help you find the right passage.


【Key Features】
・Shirone's action
Double jump by using her wings and use her tail to pull levers!
Find the exit in every stage.
　　
・3D puzzle stages
"How can you get from point A to B?" "What can you do to open the way?"
You'll need to observe Shirone's surroundings carefully to figure out the right answer.

・The haunted castle is full of strange monsters.
Shirone isn't the only one that wandered in.
How did they all end up in the castle?
It will all slowly come to light as you make progress through the stages.

・Adventure in style
Every stage has "mystery pieces" scattered about.
Collecting them will unlock hairstyles and clothing you can dress Shirone in.

1874660.name: 浮生箓 Floating Life
1874660.detailed_description:
重置版本预告

感谢大家一直以来的支持与耐心等待,制作组目前正在进行浮生箓的重置版本研发中,预计会在年后更新,已购买的玩家无需再次购买,十分感谢大家!


近期活动与公告

当前版本为先行版，官方剧本量还比较少。游戏本体内容量稍有不足，当前本体更多偏向于一款剧情编辑器。但我们会持续更新更多的官方剧本，游戏本体内容也会随着更新而拓展，诸如“NPC编辑”“NPC事件”“更多的剧情模式”等。
当前的编辑器已经能够支持大多的剧本设计，但仍有许多不足之处，因此在未来的开发中，编辑器与编辑器生成的内容可能会不断的修改优化。但这可能会带来存档的无法续用，当然我们也会尽可能的避免。
很抱歉在先行版本中可能会有诸多不妥之处，建议慎重考虑后购入。
感谢大家的支持，我们会不留余力的继续完善，争取给大家带来一个可以更好实现剧本想法的编辑器与更加活跃的社区。

特别说明：本游戏支持创意工坊，欢迎大家自由创作自己喜欢的剧本。


加入我们

欢迎关注我们官方媒体
微博 ：@浮生箓
B站：@浮生箓
抖音：@浮生箓
百度贴吧：浮生箓吧

加入官方QQ群：
1群： 767174670


About the Game

为当梦是浮生事?为复浮生是梦中。——白居易《诗喝》

《浮生箓》是一款轻量化可视化，具有选择互动式的小说游戏。我们提供了修仙、武侠等初始剧本给大家体验。当然我们也会不断的继续更新更多的故事剧本，一起体验百态人生。



-互动式轻量化小说体验-
在故事的推进中，每一项选择都有可能触发不同的故事剧情。不同的属性状态，也会可能让故事有不同的结局。紧凑性与随机性不断地相互碰撞融合，每一次都会有不一样的体验。



-创意工坊的支持-
除了我们给大家准备的初始剧本之外，我们还开放了创意工坊，这里每天都会更新大量的奇怪的或者有趣的剧本，并可以很简单的订阅并参与到其他伙伴们提供的各种故事当中。也可以发挥自己的创作才能，创作出各色各类的故事提供给大家评鉴。



-图文并茂的展示-
设计中，我们不仅可以通过文本来表达故事，还可以配上插画亦或是GIF格式的动图，这会让我们想要表达的故事更加生动灵活。



-精简的故事编辑器-
如果已经玩腻了别人的故事，又或者说一直想要撰写出自己心目中的世界。《浮生箓》会是很好的创作平台。我们提供了可视化的故事流编辑。可以让每个人都轻松的绘制出自己心目中的故事线。
故事编辑器支持：自定义属性、自定义词条、自定义行为、自定义事件、事件流-事件包-剧本；丰富的本地图片库、自定义图片/GIF动图导入。据多数使用者分析，当前编辑器基本可以做出大部分人喜欢的剧本。

1874660.short_description: 《浮生箓》是一款剧情重开模拟游戏，互动式轻量小说游戏。支持创意工坊自由编辑与上传自己的剧本，融合如修仙、武侠、玄幻等小说题材的背景，可自由选择出生的剧本，体验千变万化的人生，从出生开始让你体验到丰富多变的剧情，多种多样的选择，不同选择带来不同的变化，各种有趣的梗。来吧，开始你的浮生之旅，随着进程生成自己的浮生箓！

1874680.name: Tower Words
1874680.detailed_description:
See also






We recommend


About the Game



Tower Words is a game in which you have to type words that fit the requested categories, before the letters reach the top of the screen. The letters fall continuously, forming a tower of letters. Destroy this tower by writing words. An unusual mix of Tetris, categories game and word search.


    Some letters have other functions besides forming words:
  • Bomb letter - When used in any word, destroys the letters around the bomb
  • Frozen letter- Use more than once to clear it (thaw)
  • Virus letter - Infects the surrounding letters
  • Weight letter- When used in any word, it crushes all the letters that were below it
  • Dark letter - Try to remember the letter. Challenge your memory.
  • Clock Letter - Use it quickly before time runs out



Features
  • Educational: train your English vocabulary
  • 20 different word categories
  • Different types of obstacles
  • Earn points by writing new words
  • Unlock achievements
  • Two game modes: Classic and Endless
  • Simple mechanics: use mouse or keyboard to play
  • Minimalist art

1874690.name: Volleyhalla
1874690.detailed_description:
Enter the world of Volleyhalla, a hectic, frantic "battle-tennis" game. Defend the flock, destroy evil.

  • Engage in ritualized barbarian shepherd combat, which coincidentally happens to look a little bit like ping pong.
  • As the last Battle Shepherd, it's up to you to guard your herd from marauding beasts and harvest wool to trade for essential resources.
  • With each victory, you'll restore your land and uncover ancient secrets hidden beneath the soil.
  • Along the way, unlock unique characters who bring their own skills and stories to your journey.
  • Find and purchase new Weapons and Shields to complement your playstyle and vanquish your foes.
  • Wield unique Magics to give you an edge over your ruthless opponents and turn the tide.
  • Your destiny is to rebuild, protect, and save Volley Valley—will you rise to the challenge?

    Features

  • A lovingly realized pixel art barbarian sheep-herding world.
  • Story mode campaign, with a rich overworld.
  • Local two-player versus and co-op.
  • Controller support.

1874720.name: Elf World Adventure: Part 1
1874720.detailed_description:
You are an ordinary gamer who likes to play computer games. One day, returning home from the store, along the way you became a victim of an accident. At the last moment you think that your story is over, but some force has given you a second chance in another world that is completely different from yours. You woke up near the village of elves. As it turned out, the main character is a fan of Elves. You have decided that you will not miss the chance to start life from scratch and have fun to the fullest, and therefore you decide to get them all for yourself. You start your journey from the initial village for beginners of the first level.



In this game you will find:



  • - simple levels

  • - nice music

  • - achievements

  • - lovely pictures

  • - simple gameplay



Here you are the main character who got the opportunity to draw a path to the heart of the most beautiful and lovely elven creatures. Complete 60 simplest levels without straining. To do this, you need to use simple drawing skills. To attract their attention to yourself, draw your way to their heart. "Elf World Adventure: part 1" is a simple gameplay, beautiful music at each level and a lot of achievements that are easy to get.

The game includes many interesting simple levels. There are a lot of romantic musical accompaniments, a lot of interesting scenes that open up as the game progresses. Good luck in having fun with beautiful girls.

Keep in mind that this game has age restrictions - from 18 years and older.This game is uncomfortable to play at work. There are scenes of a sexual nature.

1874810.name: 秋恋物语 Autumn Romance
1874810.detailed_description:
本作品为异度沸腾动漫社名下沸腾工作社的原创作品。
游戏说明
本游戏是一个拥有完整剧情的视觉小说类型游戏，具有多个剧情分支和多个结局；玩家可通过阅读各章，通过不同的选项推动剧情朝不同方向发展，帮助主人公们走到结局。
在游戏中，玩家可以解锁CG，体验不同结局。
剧情故事长达二十万字，等待着玩家的探索，并且本作拥有原创的BGM和专属OP，希望能有玩家所爱！

简介
我是一个宅。我一直是一个人。我曾试想过想走出自己的房间，走到人群中去。即使是进入大学之后，我依然是一个人。我总是一个人，我知道的。我羡慕那些整日在门外奔波的同学们，羡慕他们嬉笑怒骂。不知从何时起，有了走出那扇门的想法，想要找到与我处于同一个世界的人，想要找到不是只有我一个人的栖身之处。
我只敢将自己的想法在网络中与那素未谋面的陌生人倾诉。
“你是大学生？”与我相识已久网友“枫”问道。
“听说你们学校的动漫社很有名，你为什么不去试一试呢？”
……
大二第一学期将要开学的数天前，各个社团开始招新宣传的那个夏末，怀着大大的不安与小小的期待，我一个人推开了宿舍的的门……

注意：本故事纯属虚构，游戏中出现的世界属于架空世界，与现实世界的任何人物、组合和事件无关，如有雷同，纯属巧合。

1874810.short_description: 这是个普通的故事，因为主角是个普通的阿宅，而情节是我们视而不见的日常；这是个值得怀念的故事，那是我们不会再有的时光。当平静到暗淡的大学生活因她们而掀起波澜，生活开始发生了变化。这是个氤氲着青涩懵懂的秋天，被时间和她们推着成长的你，会不会在多年以后感叹那些日子因为她们而灿烂。

1874870.name: Train Valley 2 - Myths and Rails
1874870.detailed_description:
A fine-tuned railway network will always smooth things out no matter how peculiar your new assignment may be. Should you choo-choose to accept it, be prepared for the all-new campaign that includes 20 levels revealing the miraculous world of legends, myths, fiction and subjective reality.

  • Experience new gameplay with all-new station types, industry buildings, resource and goods varieties.

  • Obtain authorization and try the 6 new locomotives.

  • Enjoy the refreshed soundtrack with the brand-new music.

  • And get to building your own train valley with 300+ new objects for the Steam Level Editor.

1874870.short_description: Myths And Rails unleashes the most bizarre and silly episodes of your railroad transportation company’s everyday schedule. Intergalactic trade agreements, alternate timelines, forgotten treasures and flying cars - timely deliveries are the key to success.

1874090.name: Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission
1874090.detailed_description:
Half-Life: Decay, the final, and most often forgotten expansion in the acclaimed Half-Life Anthology, as never seen before! Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission is a fan project that aims to rebuild every chapter from Decay from the ground up, give it a fresh coat of polish, and then retool it all to make for a seamless single-player experience, all without sacrificing any of the quality, gameplay, or presentation of the original expansion.

Planned Features:

  • Remade Decay campaign, retooled for single player
  • A newly implemented subtitle system, complete with English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Chinese, Korean, and Russian localization
  • Full support for both the original, and HD pack models
  • Commentary mode, showcasing the development of Solo Mission
  • And perhaps even more...

1874840.name: RUNNER RTX
1874840.detailed_description:
RUNNER RTX is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world but with cinematic graphics.

In this game, you have to run through an abandoned enterprise that is about to explode. The building is in a rather deplorable state, which, of course, is rather bad, but it’s much more fun to play this way, because what’s the interest in running around a deserted room where nothing can fall on your head and you won’t be able to twist your leg anywhere?

In order to more strongly feel the role of the protagonist, the game is implemented in high-end graphics, and fire particles are barely distinguishable from a blazing PC in real life!

In general, there is no more time to explain. It's time to run and save your life from the fate of being fried to a crisp!

1874890.name: OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script -Vol.2-
1874890.detailed_description:
OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script
Winner of 8 International Accolades

“Then... are you also able to sense its flow from my performance?”
“As long as I focus, then yes, I can hear you clearly.”

Every deceivingly insignificant utterance is an exquisitely crafted puzzle piece that uncovers the story’s true ending.

What makes OPUS: Echo of Starsong so unique is its layered storytelling. As the saying goes, "There is more here than meets the eye", for the text does not stop at the surface level. There are multiple layers of meaning, and this is what allows the story to keep on giving. This approach to writing strings together the entire text, allowing layers of emotion to build towards a final crescendo through rich metaphors and symbolism. This is precisely what has initiated passionate discussions among players. OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script fully lays out these meticulous twists and turns, peeling back layer after layer. How much foreshadowing can you find?

Features


- Vol. 1 & Vol. 2, total 200+ pages
- 5 chapters of the main storyline
- Exclusive Myrian translations
- Selected CGs to relive those unforgettable memories

Highly Recommended by Players


"Even if you have a pretty good sense of where the story's headed, it'll still move you."

"After completing the game, I went back and took another look at those lines I had simply browsed through. All the questions I had, the details I didn't pick up on, and the dialogues that echo the ending... they all threw me back into the vastness of lumen."

"I'm definitely going to dive back into this story, making sure to read every single line closely... To experience once again the touching nature of Echo of Starsong."

"An expansive worldview and a story that follows each climactic moment with another. There's just no way to put it down!"

"Never expected to be sucked into the story after opening the game..."

* Since the game's story is so large, this book only contains material related to the main storyline.
* Contains both English and Chinese versions.

1874200.name: I don't think I've walked this stretch of road before
1874200.detailed_description:
A short narrative adventure game by hexcavator.

Walk the length of your memories on a lonely country highway.

Follow the signal. Return to the place you left behind.

Piece together a truth you can live with.

Gameplay


-Just walk: Traverse a dreamy backroad littered with fragments from your past.
-Point-and-click: Explore vignettes and manipulate objects to gather snippets of prose.
-Thrills without chills: Reconstruct a hopeful story of personal reckoning.
-Low stakes: No combat or failure state. Move at your own pace and let curiosity guide you.
-Compact: < 30 minutes to play through.

Features


-Surreal, minimalistic 3D landscape
-Guitars + brooding analog synth ambience
-Shameless Jeff Nichols/Kelly Reichardt/David Lynch worship
-Lo-fi, low-poly, no-budget psychodrama
-Dual analog or keyboard input

Errata


I don't think I've walked this stretch of road before is a mashup of homespun 3D design, pulsating electronic sounds, and my desire to tell humanizing, hopeful stories about struggling to make sense of pain. It was built haltingly over about a year and a half using some tools I know well & others I barely understand.

I was inspired throughout by the small but resilient community of people using Gamemaker: Studio for 3D development. Like any commercial framework, GM:S has its caveats, but I appreciate its primordial, open-ended toolset, and I hope this game can be a small but interesting contribution to the scene.

More than anything, I hope it weirds you out for a little while, and maybe offers a bit of respite from grimly uncertain times.

1874250.name: MotorSim 3 Demo
1874250.detailed_description:
MotorSim 3 is the logical evolution to a 3D game of MotorSim 2, our successful Android App which scores 4'8 stars of 5.

What You Can Do:

  • Set up a number of values for your car (horsepower, weight, gear rations, drag/CX coefficient an so on).
  • Test the car (straight line only) in 3 different environments.
  • Create races among different cars with distinct configurations.
  • Set the camera in any place you want with respect to any car during the race.
  • Edit car materials and colors.
  • Edit wheels and rims (dimensions, offset, rim design, spokes count, material, color).
  • Edit engine, turbo/supercharger, transmision and gearbox sounds.
  • Modify some car parts.
  • Compare your current car performance with previously recorded ghost.
  • Learn how car acceleration physics work.

Modes:

  • Campaign mode: gain credits and upgrade your car through 270 events.
  • Free mode: set up your cars and create races as you wish (drag races up to 8 cars).


Demo limitations:
- Only 90 of 270 events are playable at campaign mode.
- Cars over 1000hp can't be tested.
- Only 1 car model of 4 can be driven.

1874230.name: RPG Town
1874230.detailed_description:
Welcome to RPG Town, a lighthearted management sim where you run a small fantasy-game town, converting local businesses to serve rowdy adventurers!

These adventurers are looking for typical RPG stuff - shops to stock up before the next big dungeon, an Inn to rest at or maybe grab a pint... but as time passes, they get impatient... Your grandmother's beautiful earthen-ware vase? They'll smash it. They'll ransack your house for pocket change. They'll drive everybody in town nuts. So what are you gonna do about it?

As Mayor of RPG Town, convert local businesses like florists and pet shops into apothecaries and bladesmiths, hire local layabouts to improve service and run errands, build roads to re-connect the town, unlock new modes and features to improve your odds, or re-purpose local monuments into your own propaganda. Do whatever it takes to survive, but be aware that your choices may come back to haunt you!

New adventurers keep coming, each looking for different goods and services… With only a handful of businesses to convert, can you keep up with their constant demands? You could increase taxes for the locals if you're low on Coin, or perhaps take advantage of special abilities some characters and businesses provide...

But beware, election time is just around the corner, and if the townies aren't happy with the job you’ve done, they're liable to vote you out with a guillotine! You’ll have to make tough choices to survive as a community and as Mayor, but if you're smart about it, you might even get rich in the process!

1874260.name: Far Away From Home
1874260.detailed_description:
Discord Community


About the Game

Far Away From Home is a story-driven tactical RPG. After a mysterious turn of events during a scientific unveiling gone awry, Simon and his allies initially think themselves lost. However, after a hostile encounter with strange creatures, they soon learn that their predicament is much more dire.


Turn-based tactical combat that will challenge you at every step as you battle your way through unique and difficult encounters.



What better way to make new friends than with food? Recruit these strange creatures to your side with tasty snacks. Utilize their unique abilities to turn the tides of battle.



Build a formidable fighting force by customizing your team to your individual playstyle. Each character can be built in a variety of ways for vastly different roles depending on the skills and stats you choose.



Find and craft powerful gear to further augment your team and change how you wage battle against your enemies.



A joint effort from various nations sees the unveiling of the worlds largest hadron collider, spanning across the globe.

Upon the first demonstration, however, strange rifts start to materialize around the Earth, drawing people into them. After getting sucked into one of these anomalies, Simon and his friends find themselves in a familiar yet unknown world.

Seemingly devoid of all other humans, but in their place, strange beasts, Simon and his friends must unravel the mystery surrounding their predicament and set off in search of a way home.

The Flow Experience is a game of focus and determination. Move, dash, and guard through enemy attacks to survive. You don't shoot. You don't attack. Just go with your instincts and stay alive.

1874320.name: Wild Souls Demo
1874320.detailed_description:
Demo Version




Plant a tree, watch the forest grow.
Wild Souls is a chill ecosystem sim with no time pressure, inspired by Don't Starve and Zoo Tycoon.
Build your own world like you would a garden, experiment which animals and plant species can live together, manage and balance the populations, write YOUR stories.

You start as a Souls Keeper : a being with the power to gather the souls of recently deceased animals and plants.
Those souls can be offered a new life, in a new body. But which body ? You decide.
Decide which species you're gonna choose to build your own world, plan ahead, improvise, experiment.

As you learn the specific needs of each species, you'll get closer to a perfectly balanced ecosystem : follow the bloodines of the creatures you added, watch their offsprings grow, and witness the stories of their lifes.


Plant a proud willow by a river. It may die, put down by a beaver or the thunder.
Or survive long enough to become the elder of a massive forest, shelter to many forest-dwellers animals...
What will it's story looks like ?


Key features :


  • Collect souls as a currency, spend them wisely to add new creatures and plants.
  • Control any animal : you can now try to survive in the very environment you created !
  • Observe your world evolve, see the livings interacts with each other in a lot of ways
  • Follow the rythm of seasons : Winter can be a difficult time for all, but in the Spring flowers will regrow on their own !
  • Relax : listen to the sounds of nature, the music, and release stress
  • Minimal features due to the demo version

1874400.name: Mini Mini-Golf
1874400.detailed_description:
Mini Mini-Golf - a minimalistic game about golf in the casual genre.

In it, you have to go through levels on which your main task will be to drive the ball into the hole with the help of a club, but everything is not so simple. Firstly, you will have a limit on the number of hits, so you have to accurately calculate each of your moves. Secondly, but each of the levels has its own difficulty, somewhere it is a winding path from the starting point to the finish line, somewhere barricades, mills with narrow passages in them, fake holes and many more difficulties interfere with passing directly.

To complete the game, you will need practice and skill in order to calculate with extreme accuracy each of your moves, the force of the blow, in order to get the ball to the right place and not fly out of the map, accidentally not get on the wrong path, and vice versa, to get out of there.

1874380.name: Karolina
1874380.detailed_description:
"Karolina" is a story-oriented game about a girl with a difficult fate.

One day, Karolina wakes up in the middle of an incomprehensible room, and sees her own body lying on the floor next to her.
In her new form, she has new abilities inherent in the ghost. Now her fate is in her hands.

With the help of the skill of inhabiting other people's bodies, she can control unconscious creatures while they are sleeping or are out.

A little later, a detective enters the game, who will eventually decide the fate of the villains.
But only Karolina will decide how to present the information to him.

The game has a unique combination of 3D graphics with 2d sprites. Thanks to the Unreal Engine, the game achieves quite beautiful graphics, and the corresponding load on the hardware.

Several episodes are planned.

- An interesting and complicated story of Caroline and those who are associated with her.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Non-linear plot
- Riddles and puzzles

The game is in early access, and in deep development. There are many bugs that will be solved regularly. The game may differ from the final result.

1874420.name: Don't Push Me
1874420.detailed_description:
Square off against your friends in this life-or-death shoving simulator!

2 Player Local Competitive 1v1. Best played with gamepads. Otherwise, keyboard can be used, and controls are displayed on screen. Keybindings can be re-bound by using the text files in the installation directory.

FEATURES

1 vs 1 - Local Player vs Player Competitive Play. The best way to play!
1 vs AI - Local training!
AI vs AI - Watch two AI duke it out, for fun!

To play ONLINE, utilize Steam's "Remote Play Together" function. The Parsec application is also recommended.

GOAL

Shove your opponent into the spikes on either side of the arena by DASHING into them!
Each MATCH is a "Best of Five".
That is, each player has "3 lives", and the first person to lose all three lives to the spikes loses the match!

MOVES

JUMP and DASH

DEFAULT CONTROLS

If no controllers or gamepads are plugged in, the game will default to the following keys. You can rebind the default controls using the KeyboardBindings.txt file in the installation directory.

Player 1
MOVEMENT/DIRECTION - W/A/S/D
JUMP - G
DASH - H

Player 2
MOVEMENT/DIRECTION - Arrow Keys
JUMP - " (quote)
DASH - ; (semicolon)

Game By Jakeypoo, @jmanoclay

Audio By Ian Smith

1874490.name: Potionomics
1874490.detailed_description:
Deluxe Edition


About the Game

After the untimely death of her uncle, a penniless witch named Sylvia finds herself thrust into the role of potion proprietor. It's all up to her to carry on her uncle's legacy and keep his potion shop afloat. Thankfully, she won't have to go it alone. With help from some new friends, Sylvia must hone her negotiation skills, outsell her craftiest competitors, and make her shop THE number-one potion destination in Rafta. It’s all about mastering the finer points of Potionomics!

Key Features

Wheel and Deal
Negotiations can be tense when every coin counts, but you'll manage Sylvia’s stress with ease by playing your cards right. Develop friendships with adventurers and other shopkeepers on Rafta to learn even more advanced negotiation tactics.

Recipe for Success
Choose the best ingredients to make even basic potions extraordinary, perfecting the taste and aroma to please your pickiest customers. But beware—if you aren’t careful, you'll get some pretty gross results!

Fantastic Friends and Foes
Rafta, home to some of the world's most potent magic, is packed with big RPG personalities, each seeking a leg up in their adventures. Befriend and recruit them to help you level up your own potion game, but don't expect everyone to be friendly…

Your Shop, Your Rules
Make your shop really pop with customizable decor. Style points aren't the only perk; decorating your shop just right can improve your prices, make better quality potions, and more!

1874510.detailed_description:
Knightlife is an open world rpg with a great storyline and many side quests. There is a lot to explore and loot. Many different weapons are waiting for a worthy fighter.

Story

The main story procures with the four villages in Knightlife. The strongest village, Wintermoor, wants to conquer Goldspring, Maplehold and Belmount. You come along as a weak knight and get to know about the attack. You help the poor people and try to scare away the attackers. You make more and more allies who can teach you new skills. There are many treasures and many secrets waiting for you in the big world. Some allies remain loyal, others do not. Save the world in Knightlife and make a name for yourself as the strongest knight ever!


Features

  • Knightlife offers a varied open world with a lot of loot.
  • Improve your weapons and your bows at the blacksmith's.
  • From explosive arrows to simple daggers, there is a lot of variety.
  • The villages have their very own system. If you help the inhabitants, your reputation will increase and you'll be rewarded with legendary equipment or exclusive quests. Besides, the villages evolve and expand their stores and houses.
  • Many small side quests make the world look alive.
  • Be wary of many different enemies, such as wizards, barbarians or even winter moor soldiers. There may even be boss fights waiting for you around some corners.
  • Specialize your character using the character editor and skill trees.
